summary: At late eighties, a boy has been found in mountains of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Nobody found out how he came in wild, nor if animals fed and raised him.
cast: Denis Muric|Milos Timotijevic|Pavle Cemerikic|Isidora Jankovic|Igor Borojevic|Hajrudin Basic|Tihomir Stanic|Borka Tomovic|Goran Susljik|Zinaida Dedakin|Branka Selic|Janko Gacic|Pavle Simovic|Dejan Tosic|Emanuel Ajeti|Milutin Milicevic|Draginja Voganjac|Marija Opsenica|Ljuba Todorovic|Ivana Zecevic|Bora Nenic|Miodrag 'Misa' Jelic|Biljana Vucic|Mihailo Laptosevic
title: Nicije dete
